origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'GreenBondAPI.analyze_performance', 'description': 'This function analyzes the performance of specified green bonds, including yield and risk levels, over a given time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bondIDs', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'The list of bond IDs to analyze.'}, {'name': 'timePeriod', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for analysis, e.g., 1year, 6months.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'yieldAnalysis', 'description': 'The yield analysis for the specified bonds.'}, {'name': 'riskAnalysis', 'description': 'The risk analysis for the specified bonds.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 GreenBondAPI.analyze_performance, 它的参数输入如下: 'bondIDs'是['GB123', 'GB456'], 'timePeriod'是'1year'.
